import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './cartItems.css' import all_product from '../Assets/all_product' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import remove_icon from '../Assets/cart_cross_icon.png' const CartItems = () => { const {all_product,CartItems,removeFromCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

Products

Title

Price

Quantity

Total

Remove

{all_product.map((e) =>{ if(CartItems[e.id]>0){ return

{e.name}

${e.new_price}

{e.new_price*CartItems[e.id]}

{removeFromCart()}} alt='' />
} })}
) } export default CartItems
